com.datumbox.framework.utilities.text.cleaners

Class HTMLCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.utilities.text.cleaners.HTMLCleaner

  • public class HTMLCleaner
extends Object
    The HTMLCleaner class is a utility class that provides a list of helpful methods which can be used to sanitize, clean up and manipulate HTML documents.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HTMLCleaner.HyperlinkPart
      Enum with the various components of a hyperlink.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<String,List<String>> extractHTMLheaders(String html)
      Extracts the HTML headers (h1-h6 tags) from an HTML page.
      static Map<HTMLCleaner.HyperlinkPart,List<String>> extractHyperlinks(String html)
      Extracts the hyperlinks from an html string and returns their components in a map.
      static Map<String,String> extractMetatags(String html)
      Extracts the meta tags from an HTML page and returns them in a map.
      static String extractText(String html)
      Extracts the text from an HTML page.
      static String extractTitle(String html)
      Extracts the title of the page.
      static String removeComments(String html)
      Removes all HTML comments from string.
      static String removeNonTextTagsAndAttributes(String html)
      Removes all non-text tags (Javascript, css etc) from a string along with all the attributes from the tags.
      static String replaceImgWithAlt(String html)
      Replaces the img tags with their alt text.
      static String safeRemoveAllTags(String html)
      A safe way to remove the tags from an HTML string.
      static String unsafeRemoveAllTags(String html)
      A fast way but unsafe way to remove the tags from an HTML string.

      • unsafeRemoveAllTags

        public static String unsafeRemoveAllTags(String html)
        A fast way but unsafe way to remove the tags from an HTML string. The method does not remove javascript, css and other non text blocks and thus it should be used with caution.
        Parameters:
        html -
        Returns:

      • safeRemoveAllTags

        public static String safeRemoveAllTags(String html)
        A safe way to remove the tags from an HTML string. The method removes first javascript, css and other non text blocks and then removes all HTML tags.
        Parameters:
        html -
        Returns:

      • removeNonTextTagsAndAttributes
